message: I propose we split the money 60/40, with me getting the larger share.  It's important to settle this early before inflation eats into our potential winnings.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer.  It's a compromise that recognizes your earlier proposal but also gives me a bit more of the pie.  Let's work together to avoid inflation eating away at our earnings.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but I believe a 55/45 split in my favor is more appropriate.  Time is running out, and we need to reach an agreement before inflation diminishes our returns.
